summary: Sébastien Grenier,a secret agent eliminates all his rivals in order to decipher who has killed some of his associates.
cast: Lino Ventura|Michel Piccoli|Bruno Cremer|Bernard Fresson|Marc Mazza|Roger Jendly|Heinz Bennent|Krystyna Janda|Beate Kopp|Christian Baltauss|Kurt Bigger|Jean-Paul Franky|Yves Boisset|Daniel Plancherel|Philippe Brizard|Dieter Moor|Pierre Boffety|Ali Lexa|Jean Reney
title: Espion, lève-toi
